resources.string: Displays which agents are running at all times.
Choose the calendars for Meeting Agent to monitor for events. You must select at least one.
A meeting (%s) was detected. Meeting Agent has started.
A meeting was detected. Meeting Agent has started.
This agent has never been enabled. Use the ON/OFF switch above to enable.
Configuring is not allowed while an agent is disabled.\n\nEnable this agent using the ON/OFF switch in the menu bar in order to make configuration changes.
Configuring is not allowed while an agent is actively running.\n\nStop this agent by clicking the status bar above in order to make configuration changes.
%1$s Agent will continue to run until you manually stop it.

Are you sure?

"I know I've made some very poor decisions recently, but I can give you my complete assurance that my work will be back to normal."
Sleep Agent has finished. Good morning!
Battery Agent has finished. Extended battery by %1$d minutes.
Parking Agent has detected a car stopping.
Saving current parking location in the background. It will take ~12 seconds.
Sleep Agent has started. Sleep tight!
Sleep agent will wait for you start it.
Meeting agent will wait for you start it.
Disabled. This agent will not start unless enabled.
Starts when your battery runs low.
Meeting Agent is waiting for your next meeting to begin.
Waiting for the next time your car stops.
Starts when you next go to sleep.
See what your friends are doing
Manually started. Will not stop by itself. Click here to stop.
Started. Conserving battery. Click to skip this time.
Started. Helping you keep your eyes on the road. Click to skip this time.
Started. Silencing your phone. Click to pause.
Started. Blocking unimportant interruptions. Click to pause.
Paused until you next go to sleep. Click to unpause now.
Paused for current meeting. Click to unpause now.

If you proceed, this agent:

• will lose all its settings.

• will not start again until reenabled.
If you proceed, this agent will not start again until reenabled.\n
Agent is a collection of 5 utilities that will make your phone smarter.
Should Parking Agent use this Bluetooth network configuration as well?
Should Drive Agent use this Bluetooth network configuration as well?
Dims screen brightness to this percent of total brightness.
Conserves your battery when you need it most.
When your battery level is low, Battery Agent will dim your display and turn off auto-sync
Don\'t start if screen is on
Battery Agent will not start if your phone is connected to any of the Wifi networks specified.
Switches off non-critical functions when battery gets below a level that you set.
Turns Bluetooth on/off to save battery.
Starts when battery goes under this percent, finishes when it goes over.
Dims screen as needed to save battery.
Pauses auto-sync. This lowers data usage, but still allows calling and messaging.
This allows anyone that calls twice within 5 minutes to get through, even if they are not in your \"who can wake me\" list.
This allows anyone that calls twice within 5 minutes to get through, even if they are not in your \"who can get through\" list.
Only the people in your \"who can wake me\" list will wake you.
By setting this, Sleep Agent will check that your phone has been still for this long before starting. Helpful for when you are up later than usual.
Save battery while sleeping. Sleep Agent will disable the systems selected above when it starts and re-enable them when it finishes.
Read non sms messages (WhatsApp, Hangouts, etc.)
"Talk to respond" will only work for English locale phones. If checked, Agent will prompt you for a voice response, transcribe it, and send it as a text message reply.
Verify urgency will respond to people in your \"Who can get through\" list via text message. Meeting Agent will only alert you if they text back with the word \"urgent\".
Verify urgency will respond to people in your \"Who can wake me\" list via text message. Sleep Agent will only wake you if they text back with the word \"urgent\".
Your feedback helps us make Agent more useful for you. Have an idea for an agent? Want an agent to work differently? We want to hear it all.\n\nPlease let us know using the resources below:
If you feel urge, good ratings and +1s are always appreciated:
Choose the days to monitor for calendar events.
Choose the time ranges during which you want this agent to run.
I am driving right now. I will get back to you soon. (auto reply from Agent app)
Automatically respond to SMS while driving.
Reads out messages and auto responds to messages and calls.
When you are driving, Drive Agent reads messages aloud and autoresponds to messages and calls
Uses Bluetooth to detect when you\'re driving.
Uses SMS to reply to those trying to contact you to let them know that you\'re driving.
Questions? Problems? Have an idea for an agent? Leave us a note.
Preserve settings on agent disable and uninstall (beta)
I am in a meeting right now. If you text \"urgent\", I will be alerted. (auto reply from Agent app)
Uses your calendar to determine when you\'re busy.
Uses your calendar to determine when you\'re busy.
Silences your phone so you\'re not disturbed during meetings.
Meeting Agent silences your phone, whenever it detects a meeting marked as \"busy\" on your calendar
Meeting Agent will only start for meetings during the following hours. \"All day\" events are ignored.
Sorry, no connection yet to Google Plus client!
WARNING: Parking Agent will only use Bluetooth. It cannot use Bluetooth and motion detection at the same time.
Click any of the items below to show it on a map.
Parking Agent has not yet recorded any locations.\n\nNote: Your location info is not sent anywhere. It is stored only on your phone.
Once you reach a certain speed it uses motion detection to determine when you\'ve parked your car.
Will store your location when you disconnect from your Bluetooth device (optional).
A pin will automatically be placed on a map inside the app to show you where you\'ve parked.
Some locations have been hidden because they are unlikely to be parking spots. Click here to reveal the hidden spots.
I\'m sleeping. If you text \"urgent\", my phone will ring loudly and wake me up. (auto reply from Agent app)
When you sleep, only the important sounds can wake you.
Silences your phone when you sleep, but allows selected people through.
Sleep Agent silences your phone when you sleep, allowing only certain people through
Sleep Agent can text the caller to verify if it\'s urgent before it wakes you up.
Uses time (e.g. 11pm to 7am) and minutes of inactivity to know you\'re sleeping.
Uses the alarm sound to wake you, when you receive an urgent message.
Will ask friends to verify urgency via text.
%1$s Agent modified your settings to save power.
%1$s Agent auto responded to a phone call.
%1$s Agent auto responded to a text.
Share your status and see your friends\' statuses
Someone needs to get a hold of you urgently.

Sometimes you need to start an agent by hand. For those cases, Agent provides widgets.


To add a widget:

(1) Find a place on your homescreen where you'd like the widget to appear.

(2)Press your finger (long press) in that location, and select the "WIDGETS" option at the bottom of your screen.

(3)This should bring up a list of all the widgets available for you to install, including the Agent widget.

(4)Press and hold on the Agent widget icon, and drag it to the location where you'd like the Agent widget to appear.

(5)A prompt asking you to connect this widget to a particular Agent (Sleep, Driving, Parking, etc.) will then appear. Select your Agent and you're done.


Now the status for this agent will be available to you even outside of the app, and you'll be able to turn it on with a simple flick.

Agent is a utility application, that makes your phone behave the way you want it to, when you want it to.

It uses the sensors on your phone (like the accelerometer, GPS, Bluetooth connections etc.) to determine what you're doing, and then changes your phone's behavior in response.

Our hope is that by making your phone behave the way you want it to, we can help you love your phone that much more.
Battery Agent helps you conserve battery. It starts when your battery level drops below a level of your choosing. You can configure it to:

• Turn off Bluetooth.
• Turn off wifi.
• Turn off mobile data.
• Dim your screen.
• Pause auto-sync [note: this will NOT prevent you from getting texts and calls. It simply stop your apps from syncing in the background].
• Revert back to normal settings when your battery level goes over that trigger initial percentage.
Sleep Agent will silence your phone automatically when you go to sleep. You can configure the following:

• Sleeping times.
• Minutes of inactivity before starting.
• Auto response to callers and texters during your sleeping hours.
• List of contacts that can wake you.

Parking Agent remembers where you parked. It does this by storing the location every time it detects motion similar to a car stopping. You also have the option to configure a Bluetooth device. It displays the last ten times your car has stopped, and shows each one on a map inside the app.
Meeting Agent syncs with your calendar to silence your phone when you don’t want to be disturbed. It is started by events on your calendar. It can be configured to:

• Start for busy events only.
• Respond to events in certain hour / day ranges only.
• Allow certain calls and messages through when you are busy.
Drive Agent eliminates driver distraction. It is started by Bluetooth or motion detection (beta feature). It can be configured to:

• Silence your phone.
• Read SMS messages aloud.
• Auto respond to texters and callers to let them know you’re driving (editable message).
• Only respond to your own hand-picked list.
• Reply to those not in your contact list.
Glad to hear it! If you have the time, we do appreciate great reviews.
Now sending debug log to Agent support.
The contacts that you have selected.
How do you feel about Agent?

Reboot your phone!

Explanation: Agent has not received any broadcasts from Android regarding your activity. Some features in certain agents that rely on motion detection will not work.

Make sure that Google Play Services is installed. If Google Play Services is installed, rebooting your phone often fixes this. Make sure to wait 3 to 5 minutes before opening Agent after reboot, since it takes a while for broadcasts to come in.
GoPro SMS inhibits Agent from receiving texts. Click for more info.
GoPro SMS inhibits Agent from receiving texts. In order to prevent GoPro from doing this, please disable \"Block Notifications\" in the Advanced settings of the GoProSMS application.
You can learn more about this issue here:\nhttp://www.tryagent.com/issues#gosmspro
Textra inhibits Agent from receiving texts. Click for more info.
Textra inhibits Agent (and all other apps) from accessing text messages. Please urge the Textra developers to fix this issue.
No potential issues were detected on your phone!
Choose the Agent you\'d like to control with this widget.
Click to edit or add time ranges.
You have no time ranges. Sleep Agent will not start.
You have no time ranges. Add some by clicking the plus sign above (top right).
This time range is longer than 24 hours.\n\nSleep Agent will run continuosly for this range. Are you sure you want to do this?
You\'re driving! Agent will help you by reading out your text messages and autoresponding.
Agent thinks you are driving. It will help you by reading out your text messages and autoresponding.
Agent thinks you are in a meeting. It will silence your phone for the duration of the meeting.
Looks like your battery is running low. Agent will help extend your battery life.
Agent thinks you\'re about to sleep. It will automatically silence your phone until you wake up.
An error occurred while trying to load statuses.
Your changes will not be saved. Are you sure you want to disregard your changes?
With \"auto respond to text messages\" and \"talk to respond\" both selected, you may respond to messages more than you mean to.
With \"auto respond to text messages\" and \"talk to respond\" both selected, you may respond to messages more than you mean to.
If both Bluetooth and motion detection are set, Agent will ignore motion detection.
Agent can silence your phone during meetings. Select the calendars you\'d like to sync with Agent.
Agent detects meetings on your selected calendars and silences your phone automatically. It also allows you to configure auto-responses and filter who can get through.
Agent can help you stay focused when driving. If you use Bluetooth in your car, pick your car\'s network now. This is optional, but helpful.
Driving detection is based off your speed and acceleration, and where possible, by looking for Bluetooth devices. Agent works much better with Bluetooth set up.
Agent automatically puts your phone in to meeting, driving, sleeping and battery saving mode, auto respond to your SMS and phone calls, and silences your phone.
Hey! Agent recorded my parking location -- it\'s here: %s
No Bluetooth devices were found. Drive Agent will use motion detection instead.

Your location setting may prevent motion detection from working. Some features in certain agents that rely on motion detection will not work.\n\nMake sure that your location setting is on either High accuracy or Battery saving.

To support ongoing development Agent is now a paid app with a free trial. 

Since you've been using Agent for a while we're going to give it to you for free. However, if you change devices or have to re-install this status will be lost.

We hope that you find Agent useful and want to be able to commit more resources to continuing to improve it with your support.

To support ongoing development Agent is now a paid app with a free trial.\n\nWe hope that you find Agent useful and want to be able to commit more resources to continuing to improve it with your support.
The trial period for Agent has ended. To continue using Agent you\'ll need to upgrade.
For Battery agent to work properly, please grant Agent capability to modify system settings. Without this capability all functionality might not work.
Agent needs permission to work properly

For Agent app to completely silence your phone and auto start driving mode, Agent need access to some permissions. Click on the notification or open the apps to give Agent app the required permissions

We will inform you of new function updates and so on.
Thank you for always using it.
Could you please write a review of AppName and support it?
